pages.title: Kamen Rider Aguilera
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:revice/devices/week_endriver)Week Endriver (Aguilera)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VI$(li)Strength IX (with empty hand)$(li)Speed II$(li)Anti Poison$(li)Haste II$(li)Flying
